name: Quartiles
definition: A quartile is one of four equal groups that a population can be divided into according to the distribution of values of a particular variable.

values.name: First Quartile
values.definition: Quantile < 0.25. The lowest 25% of the range of possible values.

values.name: Second Quartile
values.definition: 0.25 <= Quantile < 0.50. The second lowest 25% of the range of possible values.

values.name: Third Quartile
values.definition: 0.50 <= Quantile < 0.75. The second highest 25% of the range of possible values.

values.name: Fourth Quartile
values.definition: 0.75 <= Quantile <= 1.0. The highest 25% of the range of possible values.
